name: World Fit
description:
Find it too boring to exercise indoor? Now you can bike in some of the world's most iconic landscapes and beautiful cities in the world! You can also compete with AI players and other real world players in the future. Come, join the fun!

Features:
1. Support any exercise bikes by adding a cheap cadence sensor
2. Support running in place mode
3. Limitless breath-taking Realistic 3D google earth scenes. Bike or run from United States to Canada to Europe!
4. Supports multiplayer, custom songs list and custom curated levels in future release.
